alert.note: Alert for Northeast Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 25 at 4:11PM AKDT until October 26 at 1:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 1 PM AKDT WEDNESDAY FOR THOMPSON PASS... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Northeast winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Thompson Pass. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 1 PM AKDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Visibility reduced to one half mile or less at times in snow and blowing snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will begin tonight and possibly linger through tomorrow as a triple point low tracks across the Gulf. Strong, gusty, northerly winds will increase in response to the lows passage and cause blowing snow in the area.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
